content.raw:
@nkoenig I think `make test` works for you because you already have a system install of sdformat on your system. I just set up a [drone.io build](https://drone.io/bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/87) to run `make test` before `sudo make install` and a bunch of the tests fail with error messages like:
~~~
3: Error [parser.cc:49] Unable to find or open SDF file[]
…
3: Error [SDF.cc:788] Missing element description for [model]
~~~
I'm guessing that it always looks to the install target to find the sdf description files.
